item.title: CVE-2024-34790|2024-06-03T10:57:03.889Z -- Hans van Eijsden,niwreg -- ImageMagick Sharpen Resized Images
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Hans van Eijsden,niwreg ImageMagick Sharpen Resized Images allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ImageMagick Sharpen Resized Images: from n/a through 1.1.7.
